about: I am a Computer Science Engineering graduate specializing in building AI-powered, cloud-enabled, and mobile-first solutions. With experience in Flutter app development, AI/ML integration, IoT automation, and cloud infrastructure, I focus on solving real-world problems with scalable and efficient systems. Currently pursuing advanced learning in Cloud Engineering, I aim to design robust, secure, and high-performance architectures for businesses.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Computer Science & Engineering
education.description: Graduated with a focus on Cloud Computing, Artificial Intelligence, Database Management Systems, and Networking. Completed multiple hands-on projects integrating AI/ML, IoT, and cloud platforms.

journey.title: Fladdra Pvt. Ltd - Lab Automation Intern
journey.description: Shipped a Raspberry Pi battery-swap prototype; aligned device, app, and server for real-time IoT automation.

journey.title: AIT, Thailand - AI/ML Intern
journey.description: Optimized MRI tumor models using knowledge distillation; boosted inference speed while retaining accuracy.

journey.title: Next: Cloud Engineer
journey.description: Aiming to build robust, secure, and scalable cloud infrastructure in a challenging, growth-oriented role.

projects.title: AI-Powered Healthcare App
details: Approach: Integrated AI for MRI analysis (tumors, fractures) with personalized health and diet planning.
Result: Created a unified platform for patients and doctors, streamlining diagnostic workflows.

projects.title: E-Call: Environmental App
details: Problem: Lack of accessible, real-time environmental data for the public.
Approach: Developed an AI-driven app providing a CO2 counter, seasonal calendar, and news.
Result: Delivered a tool for community engagement and increased environmental awareness.

projects.title: Room Booking System
details: Problem: Manual room allocation for small-scale facilities was time-consuming and prone to scheduling conflicts.

Approach: Designed and implemented a Flutter application integrated with Google Sheets API for real-time room availability tracking, booking, and cancellation. Included automated conflict detection, date/time filters, and confirmation receipts.
Result: Reduced booking conflicts by 95%, cut scheduling time by over 50%, and provided an easy-to-use interface accessible from any device.

projects.title: Billing System for Small Pattern Business
details: Problem: Manual billing processes were slow, error-prone, and lacked centralized data tracking.

Approach: Developed a Flutter application with Google Sheets API integration to handle over 8,000 records, featuring e-bill generation (PDF & shareable link), customer/product management, advanced search & filter analytics, and CRUD operations using sample datasets for testing.
Result: Reduced manual billing time by 60%, improved data accuracy to 99.8%, and enabled on-demand sales trend reporting, boosting business decision-making speed by ~40%.

projects.title: AI-Based Movie Recommendation App
details: Problem: Generic recommendation systems often fail to adapt to user-specific preferences.

Approach: Built a Flutter application integrating the IMDB API with a Best-First Search heuristic algorithm to recommend from a database of 500,000+ movies, featuring dynamic filters (genre, year, rating, language) and real-time preference learning.
Result: Increased recommendation accuracy by ~35% over baseline methods, achieved <1.2s API response time, and delivered a smooth, mobile-friendly user experience.
